snippet: One of the last plants still standing in fields this time of year, cauliflower makes for an unexpectedly delicious, gluten-free alternative to couscous.
abstract: One of the last plants still standing in fields this time of year, cauliflower makes for an unexpectedly delicious, gluten-free alternative to couscous.

byline.original: By JEFF SCHWARZ and GREG KESSLER

headline.main: A Chef in the Field | Cauliflower
